title: Program for Enhancing Parental Decision-Making Competency in Gamete Donation Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of genetics and general understanding of reproductive technologies
context.additional_context: Experiential learning environment using smartphone-based digital content. Provides diverse decision-making scenarios based on children's age (1–16 years)

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three ethical and legal issues arising from the use of donated sperm or eggs
Achieve over 80% proficiency in decision-making skills for age-specific information-sharing strategies through VR simulations
Apply a values-based decision-making framework to real-world cases when utilizing digital tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
